title: Mapbox - Navigation
subtitle: Unity | Mapbox API | Navigation System
content: Integration of Mapbox API with Unity to create a simple navigation system using real world co-ordinates
description: Learning is something I thoroughly enjoy, this project involved me first hand trying the Mapbox API to create a simple navigation application which can determine shortest pathway to a nearby area/building of interest.
roles: Learning, understanding and integrating Mapbox with Unity
details: This project was more of a learning experiment to get a grasp of Mapbox API, its uses, features and integration with Unity to generate map and related navigational elements associated with it. Users could input specific locations, landmarks, or general instructions akin to Google Maps functionality. The system would then generate and display the fastest route from the current location to the designated destination.
